name: Ghost Rabbit
description:
There is a mysterious entity of popular imagination of Argentina, Uruguay and Chile that manifests itself as a light in the field at night but when you get closer you only find bones and death. That is interpreted by rural people as the presence of a soul in pain; they considered it a supernatural thing gave it a name: “Luz mala” (Evil light). According to the beliefs this was a soul that left its grave and meandered along the living people’s world to take revenge for having died unfairly.
The scientific explanation is that it is a light phenomenon that occurs when the phosphorus contained in the bones of some dead animals decomposes under certain conditions and that can be clearly seen in the night darkness. 

Part of the "Luz Mala" collection
